data.name: Setting_Description
data.value: Create window layouts to help make multi-tasking easy
data.comment: this is NOT referring to the operating system.

data.name: Setting_Description_ShiftDrag
data.value: Hold Shift key to activate zones while dragging
data.comment: SHIFT is referring to keyboard key.

data.name: Setting_Description_MouseSwitch
data.value: Use a non-primary mouse button to toggle zone activation

data.name: Setting_Description_Override_Snap_Hotkeys
data.value: Override Windows Snap hotkeys (Win + Arrow) to move windows between zones
data.comment: Windows is referring to OS. Win is referring to Windows Key, "Arrow" is referring to keyboard key.

data.name: Setting_Description_Move_Window_Across_Monitors
data.value: Move windows between zones across all monitors when snapping with (Win + Arrow)
data.comment: windows is referring to the display surfaces like applications, not the OS. Win is referring to Windows Key, "Arrow" is referring to keyboard key.

data.name: Setting_Description_Move_Windows_Based_On_Position
data.value: Move windows based on their position when snapping with (Win + Arrow)
data.comment: windows is referring to the display surfaces like applications, not the OS. Win is referring to Windows Key, "Arrow" is referring to keyboard key.

data.name: Setting_Description_DisplayChange_MoveWindows
data.value: Keep windows in their zones when the screen resolution changes
data.comment: windows is referring to the display surfaces like applications, not the OS.

data.name: Setting_Description_ZoneSetChange_MoveWindows
data.value: During zone layout changes, windows assigned to a zone will match new size/positions
data.comment: windows is referring to the display surfaces like applications, not the OS.

data.name: Setting_Description_ZoneSetChange_FlashZones
data.value: Flash zones when the active FancyZones layout changes
data.comment: Flash refers to blinking the zone so it appears/disappears. FancyZones is the product name

data.name: Setting_Description_Show_Fancy_Zones_On_All_Monitors
data.value: Show zones on all monitors while dragging a window

data.name: Setting_Description_Span_Zones_Across_Monitors
data.value: Allow zones to span across monitors (all monitors must have the same DPI scaling)

data.name: Setting_Description_Make_Dragged_Window_Transparent
data.value: Make dragged window transparent

data.name: Setting_Description_ZoneColor
data.value: Zone inactive color (Default #F5FCFF)

data.name: Setting_Description_Zone_Border_Color
data.value: Zone border color (Default #FFFFFF)

data.name: Setting_Description_ZoneHighlightColor
data.value: Zone highlight color (Default #008CFF)

data.name: Setting_Description_Use_CursorPos_Editor_StartupScreen
data.value: Follow mouse cursor instead of focus when launching editor in a multi-screen environment

data.name: Setting_Description_AppLastZone_MoveWindows
data.value: Move newly created windows to their last known zone
data.comment: windows is referring to the display surfaces like applications, not the OS.

data.name: Setting_Description_Open_Window_On_Active_Monitor
data.value: Move newly created windows to the current active monitor [EXPERIMENTAL]

data.name: Setting_Description_RestoreSize
data.value: Restore the original size of windows when unsnapping

data.name: Setting_Launch_Editor_Label
data.value: Zone configuration

data.name: Setting_Launch_Editor_Button
data.value: Edit zones

data.name: Setting_Launch_Editor_Description
data.value: To launch the zone editor, select the Edit zones button below or press the zone editor hotkey anytime
data.comment: "Edit zones" must match value from Setting_Launch_Editor_Button value

data.name: Setting_Launch_Editor_Hotkey_Label
data.value: Configure the zone editor hotkey

data.name: Setting_Window_Switching_Toggle_Label
data.value: Toggle shortcuts for switching between windows in the current zone

data.name: Setting_Next_Tab_Hotkey_Label
data.value: Shortcut for switching to the next window in the current zone

data.name: Setting_Prev_Tab_Hotkey_Label
data.value: Shortcut for switching to the previous window in the current zone

data.name: Setting_Excluded_Apps_Description
data.value: To exclude an application from snapping to zones add its name here (one per line). Excluded apps will react to the Windows Snap regardless of all other settings.
data.comment: Windows refers to the Operating system

data.name: Settings_Highlight_Opacity
data.value: Zone opacity (%)
data.comment: a zone is a snapping region and can be transparent

data.name: FancyZones
data.value: FancyZones
data.comment: FancyZone is a product name, keep as is.

data.name: Cant_Drag_Elevated
data.value: We've detected an application running with administrator privileges. This will prevent certain interactions with these applications.
data.comment: administrator is context of user account.

data.name: Cant_Drag_Elevated_Learn_More
data.value: Learn more

data.name: Cant_Drag_Elevated_Dialog_Dont_Show_Again
data.value: Don't show again

data.name: Keyboard_Listener_Error
data.value: Failed to install keyboard listener.

data.name: Window_Event_Listener_Error
data.value: Failed to install Windows event listener.
data.comment: Windows refers to the Operating system

data.name: Powertoys_FancyZones
data.value: PowerToys - FancyZones
data.comment: do not loc. Both are product names

data.name: Span_Across_Zones_Warning
data.value: The 'Allow zones to span across monitors' option requires all monitors to have the same DPI scaling to work properly.

data.name: FancyZones_Data_Error
data.value: FancyZones persisted data path not found. Please report the bug to
data.comment: "Report bug to" will have a URL after. FancyZone is a product name, keep as is.

data.name: FancyZones_Editor_Launch_Error
data.value: The FancyZones editor failed to start. Please report the bug to
data.comment: "Report bug to" will have a URL after. FancyZone is a product name, keep as is.

data.name: FancyZones_Settings_Load_Error
data.value: Failed to load the FancyZones settings. Default settings will be used.
data.comment: FancyZone is a product name, keep as is.

data.name: FancyZones_Settings_Save_Error
data.value: Failed to save the FancyZones settings. Please retry again later, if the problem persists report the bug to
data.comment: "Report bug to" will have a URL after. FancyZone is a product name, keep as is.

data.name: Setting_Description_QuickLayoutSwitch
data.value: Enable quick layout switch

data.name: Setting_Description_FlashZonesOnQuickSwitch
data.value: Flash zones when switching layout

data.name: Setting_Description_System_Theme
data.value: Use system theme

data.name: Setting_Description_Zone_Number_Color
data.value: Zone number color (Default #000000)

data.name: Setting_Description_Show_Zone_Number
data.value: Show zone number
